entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Sioux Lookout
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -12.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sioux Lookout Airport 12:50 PM CST Friday 27 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -12.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 80 %
Wind Chill: -23
Dewpoint: -15.4°C
Wind: NW 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 13. Wind chill near minus 25. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 25 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 28 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 27 January 2023
